name: BriteVerify.com
overview:
What is BriteVerify BriteVerify (BV), by Origin Ads Group, is your source for fast, easy, and inexpensive data verification. BV was designed to deliver maximum value for minimum commitment. Whether you need live verification (web registration) or file verification, BriteVerify will exceed your expectations on quality and cost!

Verify Live Consumer Interaction BriteVerify helps manage live consumer experiences. Our verification tools ensure that each website data submission contains only valid consumer information. If BV identifies invalid information, you can either request that the consumer correct their information or allow them to move forward without correction. While you are in complete control of the consumer experience, donâ€™t waste your marketing dollars on invalid information. Capture it correctly with BriteVerify.

File Verification BriteVerifyâ€™s upload tool will keep your consumer database clean and up-to-date. Once you have an active account, simply send your files to BriteVerify and weâ€™ll confirm price and return delivery date. BriteVerify takes the guesswork out of file verification.

BriteVerify Services â€¢ Email Verification - Donâ€™t send emails to bad addresses, itâ€™ll hurt your reputation. BV verifies email format, working domain and working account without delivering an email to the inbox. Keep your reputation and your IPs clean with BV. â€¢ Postal Verification - Direct mail is expensive, donâ€™t waste money on bad postal addresses. BV ensures that every postal record is DVP verified and normalized. Simply send BV a minimum of street address and zip code and weâ€™ll do the rest. â€¢ Phone Verification - Phone leads are expensive, donâ€™t pay for the bad ones. BV verifies working phone number and phone type (land-line or mobile) BEFORE you pay for leads. â€¢ IP Address Verification - Your database marketing efforts can improve with as little as an IP address. BVâ€™s IP Verifier will identify the country, state and city of any consumer IP address. â€¢ Full Form Verification - By combining above services BV will verify an entire form of information in real-time to ensure that each consumer profile is complete and valid.
